abstract: News analysis; marked lack of intellectual standard-bearers in the Arab Spring raises the question of whether intellectuals are needed at all to sustain modern revolutions.
snippet: The Arab Spring has not yielded any intellectual standard-bearers of the kind who shaped almost every modern revolution from 1776 onward.

headline.main: The Arab Intellectuals Who Didn’t Roar
